translation: At the end of many births, the wise man comes to Me, realizing that all this is Vaasudeva (the innermost Self); such a great soul (Mahatma) is very hard to find.
commentary: 7.19 of many of many? of births of births? Ante in the end? wise the wise? Me to Me? approaches approaches? Vasudeva: Vaasudeva? Everything all? It is thus? He he? Mahatma the great soul?
